hero.intro: I'm a software engineer and I build user focused web tools and applications. My current focus is on bringing theming and internationalization to an eclectic group of projects.

landingIntro.about: My current work is foucused around user centered UX/UI design front-end implementation. On the side, I'm building my knowledge base around all things web development, Japanese, Korean, and more.
landingIntro.header: I'm a multi-passionate creator focusing on development, language learning, & a few other things
